name: Dead Streets
description:
Prototype of procedural maze-like town generator with some basic top-down shooter gameplay, made for ProcJam 2017.

Controls:

WSAD - movement

LMB - fire

RMB - melee/shove

1/2/3 - switch weapons

R - reload

Shift - sprint

TAB - view map

Esc - pause

Assets credits: 

https://opengameart.org/content/animated-top-down-survivor-player

https://opengameart.org/content/animated-top-down-zombie

https://opengameart.org/content/zombies-sound-pack

https://opengameart.org/content/blood-decals-32-in-zip-file

https://www.1001freefonts.com/bloodlust.font
